oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Oil Sands Information Portal is a one-window source for individuals interested in the environmental impacts of oil sands development. The portal will focus on the cumulative effects of development on the oil sands regionâ€™s Air, Water, Land, Climate Change and Biodiversity/Wildlife. The portal has both an interactive map display and a data library.
